posts.title: White Box Entertainment - Year One Achievements
posts.content: In 2024, I started a marketing and research agency focused on anime and manga. I hadn't planned to...until I had already signed a few clients and pulled together a small team, but thanks to that incredible team, White Box Entertainment has helped publishers reach and understand audiences overseas. Now it's 2025! We blew past our year one goals by August, so we'll be setting our sights even higher, including more comprehensive reports, deeper dives into the mangasphere, and other novel research that I can't wait to share with all of you. Please keep an eye out for updates! This could never have happened without the foundational support of people like Rob Pereyda, Kwok-Wai H., Jerome Mazandarani, and many others. Of course, I also need to show some gratitude to the unbelievably talented folks who put up with me every day: Idy Tao, Chloe Catoya, Ariel Chan, Klaudia AmenÃ¡bar, Kayode Jaiyeola, Austin Yi, and Leah T. Thank you all for being a part of the ride, and for everyone else: please reach out if you'd like to know more about us!
